version_description:
With this release of the AMEX App you can:
· Follow up on your service requests using the new “Inbox” feature.
· Unblock your Card PIN online.
· Register a new account directly on the App.

This release of the AMEX App introduces an updated App name (AMEX MENA) as the App is now available on all International App stores. In addition, with this release you can set your Statement Delivery Preferences and choose between e-statements or paper statements.

What is New:
The facility to refer friends and receive bonus Membership Rewards points
Minor fixes and enhancements

• Online Payment in Qatar
• Access to the Interactive Membership Rewards Catalogue
• Performance Enhancements

Online Payment in Qatar now available!
We added QPAY as a new payment gateway. Cardmembers in Qatar can now pay their bill quickly and conveniently using AMEX MENA APP

Interactive Membership Rewards® Catalogue
Discover what your Membership Rewards points can get you with your AMEX MENA App. Browse through hundreds of options and redeem your points for complimentary flights, hotels, merchandise, gift cards and much more.

- Points Booster
- Relationship Manager
- Account Lockout Mechanism

- Participate to our tailor made initiatives in a fun and intuitive way, track your progress and achievements through the Points Booster
- Reach out to your dedicated Relationship Manager directly from within the app (Product Specific feature)
- User account will be locked out when the Cardmember enters 4 consecutive invalid login attempts

Introducing Supplementary Card Limits
- Customize the credit limit for your Supplementary Cards based on your preference

- Update in Pay Your Bill
- Update of Our Offices
- Minor fixes
Refer your friends easily with improved user experience
Enhanced search & filter options on all your Card transactions
You can now view the latest Cardmember Offers all in one place
New feature – Select & Pay with Points
Minor Fixes and New Fraud Prevention Feature
Supplementary Cardmembers Access and performance enhancement

New:
- Fraud prevention.
- Check your insurance coverage, submit and track your claims.

Enhanced:
- Refer a friend and get rewarded.
- Improvement of the Feedback feature.
